2. Click on '....'
3. Scroll down to '....'
4. See error

A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen.

- Platform: [e.g. Web, iOS]

- MIDI Device: [e.g. Yamaha P-125, Native Instruments Komplete Kontrol]
